title: Topanga Villa Apartments..Gorgeous Newly Remodeled One Bedroom!
posting_body: The apartment includes laminate and ceramic tile floors, new blinds, new light fixtures, and a large closet!!...
The building has the luxury of a pool, gas BBQ area, beautiful garden, covered and gated parking, and controlled access!!
Minutes away from Warner Center, Pierce College, Canoga Park Elementary, Topanga mall, AMC theater and Library, , Vons, Ralphs and Rite Aid....Cats are allowed with additional deposit!!
Professionally managed by Statewide Enterprises, Inc. (A+ rated by the Better Business Bureau).
Pictures in this ad are a representation and may not reflect the actual apartment that is currently available.
To view a virtual tour of unit similar to 6 - 1Bed/1Bath - <URL>
-Quoted security deposit is on approved credit.
-6 or 12 month lease - Six month lease available with $200 monthly surcharge .
The rent, deposit, concession and terms listed in this ad are only valid for the actual date that this ad was initially posted.
